level.heading: Standards of professional responsibility and mandatory reporting not affected.

level.text: The professional responsibility obligations and standards applicable to a lawyer or other licensed professional; or
The obligation of a person to report abuse, neglect, abandonment, or exploitation of a child or adult under the law of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-125, see notes under ยง 16-4001.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 13 of the Uniform Collaborative Law Act. See Vol. 7 , Part 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
